sys_ui_macro.description: Button to add the Work Info data in the Incidents form to the Work Info form.
sys_ui_macro.name: add_work_info
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<button id="button" onclick="button();">Add Work Info</button>	
<script>
     function button(){
             var wi = new GlideRecord('x_133853_test_serv_work_info');
             wi.initialize();
             wi.work_info = current.u_worklog;
             wi.insert();
	}
    </script> 
</j:jelly>
